title: [Question] When will we get the original documents back
content:
Guys i need my original class 10th marks card for some reason will they give it if visit the campus? 
 i have to make sure that they will give because i do not live in bangalore

comments.body: U can get temporarily like for passport by giving letter to admission in mrd block
They gave ours back during 3rd year
Oh? I heard they return after 1st year
You can collect it any time after 1st year
They will give it any time. But u must and shud take the checkbox list they gave at the time of admission. Also state some good reason
At the end of your first year.
U can collect it after a year maybe
...that's not standard protocol. Not sure what happened for your batch, but historically they're always known to spam you with emails from the end of your first year.
they kept it untill third year for our batch , but if we need them for passport or any other stuff in between , we could write a letter and get it back.
They only give them back if we ask
Is the presence of student compulsory??
You need to visit the MRD block and they'll give
They require the students signature just for proof so yes
